definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Canadian Transformers Live Action Movie Fans are in for a treat.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大變形金剛真人電影迷都在爲一種享受。

sentences.english: Shall we go and see the film called "Transformers"?
sentences.chinese: 我們去看那部叫“變形金剛”的電影好嗎？

sentences.english: He voices Soundwave & Devastator in Fallen.
sentences.chinese: 《變形金剛2》中聲波和大力神由他配音。

sentences.english: This is the first time met Sam Bo sent Transformers Hornet process.
sentences.chinese: 這就是山姆第一次遇見博派變形金剛大黃蜂的過程。

sentences.english: Do you want to see a Transformers 3 Trailer on this Featurette?
sentences.chinese: 你想在這個特輯看到一個變形金剛3預告片？

sentences.english: Their present to Justin himself is a transformer-motorcycle.
sentences.chinese: 姨丈和阿姨送了變形金剛摩托車給大貝貝。

sentences.english: The Transformers wallpaper on this laptop says it all.
sentences.chinese: 變形金剛的壁紙說明了一切。

sentences.english: If you are a true fanboy, you'll skip work and go see the flick at the afternoon showing.
sentences.chinese: 你真的是變形金剛迷，你會翹班去電影院看下午場。

sentences.english: The new Transformers Movie will definitely NOT be available on Blue-ray Disc.
sentences.chinese: 新的變形金剛電影將肯定不會出藍光盤版。

sentences.english: Like zoids, or transformers, or maybe even bigger.
sentences.chinese: 像小生物，或者變形金剛，甚至或許更大。

sentences.english: If I were Obama, I would ask Spiderman and Transformers to work for me.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是奧巴馬，我會讓蜘蛛俠和變形金剛爲我工作。

definition: iQiyi, online video platform based in Beijing, launched in 2010
